metadata.title: CVE-2021-26199 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 2.4.0. There is aheap-use-after-free in ecma_bytecode_ref in ecma-helpers.c file.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
